category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEShowHideUnconfiguredAll
preference.preference_description: Determines the visibility and content of a rich client selector for show or hide all unconfigured actions when the Manufacturing application is opened or a new BOM window is created. Valid Values: Individual - The selector is not visible. Both - The selector is visible. All - The selector is visible, but the show unconfigured toggle actions are not visible on the toolbar.
